pli-tv-pvr8:1.1: Uposathakammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.2: Pavāraṇākammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.3: Tajjanīyakammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.12: upasampadākammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.13: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.14: Niyassakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.15: Pabbājanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.16: Paṭisāraṇīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.17: Ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.18: Sativinayassa ko ādi, kiṃ majje, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.19: Amūḷhavinayassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.20: Tassapāpiyasikāya ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.21: Tiṇavatthārakassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.22: Bhikkhunovādakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.23: Ticīvarena avippavāsasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.24: Santhatasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.25: Rūpiyachaḍḍakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.26: Sāṭiyaggāhāpakasammutiyo ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.27: Pattaggāhāpakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.28: Daṇḍasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.29: Sikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.30: Daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.1: Uposathakammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.2: Uposathakammassa sāmaggī ādi, kiriyā majjhe, niṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:3.1: Pavāraṇākammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:3.2: Pavāraṇākammassa sāmaggī ādi, kiriyā majjhe, niṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:4.1: Tajjanīyakammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:4.2: Tajjanīyakammassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:5.8: abbhānassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:5.9: Abbhānassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:6.1: Upasampadākammassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:6.2: Upasampadākammassa puggalo ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:7.1: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:7.2: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā sammāvattanā ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:8.4: ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:8.5: Ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā sammāvattanā ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:9.1: Sativinayassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:9.2: Sativinayassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr8:10.12: daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:10.13: Daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṃ.
